name: Daily Muse, Inc.
description: Operator of a career and employment platform intended to help find careers and jobs in preferred companies. The company's platform provides career advice, skills-building and in-depth coverage of employers including behind-the-scenes videos of company headquarters and interviews with employees, enabling recruiters to seamlessly choose the person suited for the job from a diverse pool of qualified candidates.
one_liner: Operator of a career and employment platform intended to help find careers and jobs in preferred companies. The company's platform provides career advice, skills-building and in-depth coverage of employers including behind-the-scenes videos of company headquarters and interviews with employees, enabling recruiters to seamlessly choose the person suited for the job from a diverse pool of qualified candidates.
